title: #353:  RHOBH Premiere - Panic at the Disco
description:
Real Housewives of Beverly Hills is back! We've got over an hour of recapping coverage: from Dorit to Studio 54, Boy George to Erika's Chagall. We go deep into all of it. Afterwards, we turn our attention to "Ladies of London," which has more gift shop drama than you could even imagine. (And yes, we're very sad that we couldn't name this episode "Brexit Through The Gift Shop." Alas, RHOBH must be the lead story!)

Here are the time codes:

00:00:00 - Intro
00:07:08 - Crappens Mailbag!
00:19:29 - Tipsy Elves!
00:21:04 - Real Housewives of Beverly Hills premiere!
01:27:23 - Ladies of London!

Subscribe at https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/watch-what-crappens/id498130432?mt=2
Support us at patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
